comment: Black probably reasoned that his queen could not be taken because of the back rank mate (Rc8xc1 mate), and meanwhile, all of White's pieces are hanging. reasoning: The comment correctly identifies the tactical error made by Black, ignoring the potential checkmate threat after 23.Re1+ Kd6 24.Qb4+ Rc5, which leads to a decisive attack.
